children.type: Text?text=Log in to a different account;style.fontSize=1.6rem
Text?text=More than a million of the world's most successful brands trust BracketB to sell, ship and process payments anywhere.;style.fontSize=1.9rem;style.color=#888
Text?text=Try BracketB free for 14 days, no credit card required. By entering your email, you agree to receive marketing emails from BracketB.;style.fontSize=1.2rem
Text?text=Create an ecommerce website backed by powerful tools that help you find customers, drive sales, and manage your day-to-day.;style.fontSize=1.5rem;style.color=#fff
Text?text=Create a business, whether youâ€™ve got a fresh idea or are looking for a new way to make money.;style.color=#fff;style.fontSize=1.5rem
Text?text=Turn your retail store into an online store and keep serving customers without missing a beat.;style.color=#fff;style.fontSize=1.5rem
Text?text=Bring your business to Shopify, no matter which ecommerce platform youâ€™re currently using.;style.color=#fff;style.fontSize=1.5rem
Text?text=Get set up with the help of a trusted freelancer or agency from the Shopify Experts Marketplace.;style.color=#fff;style.fontSize=1.5rem
Text?class=flex-box;text=One platform with all the ecommerce and point of sale features you need to start, run, and grow your business.;style.fontSize=1.8rem;style.color=#666

Text?style.paddingRight=8rem;style.width=100%;text=Use one platform to sell products to anyone, anywhereâ€”in person with Point of Sale and online through your website, social media, and online marketplaces.;style.color=#888;style.fontSize=1.6rem;
Text?style.width=100%;text=Take the guesswork out of marketing with built-in tools that help you create, execute, and analyze digital marketing campaigns.;style.color=#888;style.fontSize=1.6rem;

Text?style.paddingRight=10rem;style.width=100%;text=Gain the insights you need to growâ€”use a single dashboard to manage orders, shipping, and payments anywhere you go.;style.color=#888;style.fontSize=1.6rem

Text?style.paddingRight=10rem;style.width=100%;text=Over 1,700,000 businesses in 175 countries around the world have made over $200 billion USD in sales using BracketB.;style.color=#444;style.fontSize=2.2rem;style.width=80rem

Text?class=flex-box;text=[_quotations].add():Weâ€™ve been able to build something in 3 years that a lot of brands havenâ€™t actually gotten to in 10 years.add():_quotations;style.color=#fff;style.fontSize=2.9rem;style.lineHeight=5rem
Text?text=Get the help you need, every step of the way;style.fontSize=4rem;style.width=85%;style.color=#222
Text?style.width=100%;text=Contact support 24/7, whether youâ€™re troubleshooting issues or looking for business advice.;style.color=#888;style.fontSize=1.5rem
Text?style.width=100%;text=Add features and functionality to your business with 6,000+ apps that integrate directly with Shopify.;style.color=#888;style.fontSize=1.5rem
Text?style.width=100%;text=Hire a Shopify expert to help you with everything from store setup to SEO.;style.color=#888;style.fontSize=1.5rem
Text?class=flex-box;style.width=60%;text=Try BracketB for free, and explore all the tools and services you need to start, run, and grow your business.;style.fontSize=1.6rem;style.color=#666
